title.rendered: Eldorado Stone Generates a Buzz at the Kitchen & Bath Industry Show

content.rendered: To celebrate the latest product launches, Eldorado Stone hosted two designer/architect events at KBIS 2011 and packed their booth with more than 120 attendees to see Eldorado’s newest products! Eldorado Stone also hosted booth tours for magazine editors representing more than 20 top publications. The KBIS booth featured the new Eldorado Fireplace Surrounds, Eldorado Outdoor, and LedgeCut33.
